H0.text: Which composer was married to Clara Wieck from 1840 until his death in 1856. Franz Liszt

H1.text: Which composer was married to Clara Wieck from 1840 until his death in 1856. Johannes Brahms

H2.text: Which composer was married to Clara Wieck from 1840 until his death in 1856. Felix Mendelssohn

H3.text: Which composer was married to Clara Wieck from 1840 until his death in 1856. Robert Schumann

A4.text: Schumann married Wieck's daughter Clara in 1840.

A5.text: Schumann and Clara finally married on 12 September 1840, the day before her twenty-first birthday.
